allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Google Analytics and make material icons free

- Add GA4 tracking to index.html with SPA page view tracking in App.tsx
- Exclude materialIcon from counting towards user''s 10 free monthly creations
- Update backend \(usageHelpers, consume-credits\) to skip quota for free generation types
- Update frontend UsageContext to skip counting materialIcon for anonymous users

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
